name: Innovadata-2013
tagline: Data Visualization project built for the BBVA's International data journalism challenge 2013. Awarded with the 2nd place in the Data Visualization category.
body:
## Spain Migration Flows - Data Visualization project
***

Project built for the [BBVA's International Data Journalism Challenge](https://www.centrodeinnovacionbbva.com/innovadata).
This international challenge focuses on journalists and developers and the aim is to reward the best visualizations and the best unpublished articles or reports based on the visualization of a set of data from various sources. Projects taking part in this competition will supply value in terms of information from constructive viewpoint of society and our environment.

The data visualization project shows the migration flows in Spain over a certain period of time, displaying the main migrant's destinations as well as the flow behaviors for each country.

The project has been built using:
*  [Open Refine](openrefine.org/â€Ž)
*  [Processing](http://processing.org/)
* [Unfolding maps](http://unfoldingmaps.org/)
* Java

The data was obtained from the [National Institute of Statistics of Spain](http://www.ine.es/).
